name: Xiaoning Ding
content: Ding, Xiaoning's Page Xiaoning Ding Associate Professor Department of Computer Science New Jersey Institute of Technology University Heights, Newark, NJ 07102, USA Office: GITC 4203 Phone: (973)596-3390 Email: xiaoning.ding AT njit DOT edu Xiaoning Ding is an associate professor in Department of Computer Science at New Jersey Institute of Technology. He received his Ph.D. degree in Computer Science and Engineering from the Ohio State University in 2010. His interests are in the area of experimental computer systems, including edge/cloud computing infrastructures, virtualization, edge/cloud systems for AI/DL, parallel and distributed systems, memory and storage systems, operating systems, database systems, and computer architecture.
